What it is: Initiates symbolic contact with the myth you’re unconsciously living out.
How to use it: Ask AI: ‘If my life were a myth in progress, what myth is it and what’s the next act?’
What it changes: Links personal struggle to mythic trajectory for empowerment.

What it is: Analyzes how addictive behavior compensates for lost autonomy.
How to use it: Describe your compulsions. Ask AI how they symbolically restore a lost sense of choice.
What it changes: Turns dependence into a map toward reclaiming agency.

What it is: Detects the symbolic protections you wear in social contexts.
How to use it: Describe your social persona. Ask AI what armor you wear and what it protects.
What it changes: Replaces false fronts with empowered vulnerability.

What it is: Measures symbolic markers of vitality and numbness in your inner life.
How to use it: List recent thoughts or habits. Ask AI to rate their aliveness level and suggest catalytic alternatives.

What it is: Collects and analyzes repeated dream symbols over time.
How to use it: Describe 3+ dreams. Ask AI to extract recurring motifs and symbolic shifts.

What it is: Forecasts upcoming emotional turbulence based on inner signals.
How to use it: List current fears, tensions, or urges. Ask AI to simulate the symbolic weather to come.
What it changes: Prepares you symbolically and emotionally for internal storms.

What it is: Designs a symbolic act of defiance against internalized oppression.
How to use it: Describe an internal rule that suffocates you. Ask AI to craft a ritual of symbolic defiance.

What it is: Reassigns the archetypes you unconsciously live out to more empowering ones.
How to use it: Ask AI which archetypes dominate your self-narrative, then request upgrades or replacements.
What it changes: Evolves inner roles and mythic identity structure.

What it is: Translates passive-aggressive, sarcastic, or coded self-talk into direct shadow speech.
How to use it: Write your inner dialogue. Ask AI to decode what the shadow is really saying.
What it changes: Exposes suppressed drives and clears distortions.

What it is: Stages a symbolic ending to something left open.
How to use it: Describe a lingering situation. Ask AI to create a symbolic closure event or ritual.
What it changes: Seals loops that otherwise drain emotional resources.
